Earlier this year, we announced the opt-in public preview for the new Devices experience in the Microsoft Intune admin center. This new experience is expected to become the default experience starting with Intuneâ€™s January (2401) service release and enabled for all admins by the end of February 2024.

[How this will affect your organization:]

The new Devices experience will be turned on for all admins and there will not be an option to opt-out.

[What you need to do to prepare:]

To ensure a smooth transition, we recommend admins familiarize themselves with the new experience ahead of this change by opting into the public preview. For more information about the new experience and how to opt-in, read Try new Devices experience in Microsoft Intune.

Title: Plan for Change: New Devices experience will soon become the default experience
